message.content:
cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC 

The paper deals with reconstructing perceived images from brain activity, which is a task related to computer vision and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves learning a visually-relevant latent representation from fMRI signals, which is a task related to neural networks and deep learning. Therefore, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a likely category. The paper also involves reducing noise and encoding powerful visual representations, which are tasks related to machine learning and statistics. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another likely category. The paper also involves adapting cognitive features to visual feature space, which is a task related to artificial intelligence and cognitive science. Therefore, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another likely category. Finally, the paper also involves reconstructing perceived images from brain activity, which is a task related to human-computer interaction and cognitive science. Therefore, cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is another likely category.
